title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, March 12, 2015
description: Airing on Thursday, March 12, 2015: This is a special SXSWedu edition from our coverage in Austin this week. Marketplace's Adriene Hill, and the Learning Curve team, have taken over today - they have the latest from SXSWedu on what new research and technology have to tell us about the way kids learn.
